species_list

Source: R/species_list.R
species_list.Rd

Return the a species list given a taxonomic group

species_list(Class = NULL, Order = NULL, Family = NULL,
  Subfamily = NULL, Genus = NULL, Species = NULL, SpecCode = NULL,
  SuperClass = NULL, server = getOption("FISHBASE_API", FISHBASE_API))

Arguments

Class

Request all species in this taxonomic Class
Order

Request all species in this taxonomic Order
Family

Request all species in this taxonomic Family
Subfamily

Request all species in this taxonomic SubFamily
Genus

Request all species in this taxonomic Genus
Species

Request all species in this taxonomic Species
SpecCode

Request species name of species matching this SpecCode
SuperClass

Request all species of this Superclass
server

fishbase or

Examples

## All species in the Family 
  species_list(Family = 'Scaridae')
#>   [1] "Nicholsina usta"             "Scarus coelestinus"         
#>   [3] "Scarus coeruleus"            "Scarus iseri"               
#>   [5] "Scarus guacamaia"            "Scarus taeniopterus"        
#>   [7] "Scarus vetula"               "Sparisoma aurofrenatum"     
#>   [9] "Sparisoma chrysopterum"      "Sparisoma rubripinne"       
#>  [11] "Sparisoma viride"            "Scarus arabicus"            
#>  [13] "Scarus hypselopterus"        "Scarus obishime"            
#>  [15] "Chlorurus strongylocephalus" "Sparisoma cretense"         
#>  [17] "Nicholsina denticulata"      "Scarus compressus"          
#>  [19] "Scarus collana"              "Scarus ferrugineus"         
#>  [21] "Scarus fuscopurpureus"       "Chlorurus genazonatus"      
#>  [23] "Scarus persicus"             "Nicholsina collettei"       
#>  [25] "Sparisoma strigatum"         "Scarus ovifrons"            
#>  [27] "Chlorurus capistratoides"    "Scarus zufar"               
#>  [29] "Cryptotomus roseus"          "Sparisoma atomarium"        
#>  [31] "Sparisoma radians"           "Calotomus carolinus"        
#>  [33] "Calotomus japonicus"         "Calotomus spinidens"        
#>  [35] "Calotomus viridescens"       "Calotomus zonarchus"        
#>  [37] "Leptoscarus vaigiensis"      "Chlorurus rhakoura"         
#>  [39] "Scarus dubius"               "Scarus flavipectoralis"     
#>  [41] "Scarus rivulatus"            "Scarus globiceps"           
#>  [43] "Scarus prasiognathos"        "Scarus dimidiatus"          
#>  [45] "Scarus spinus"               "Scarus schlegeli"           
#>  [47] "Chlorurus bleekeri"          "Chlorurus troschelii"       
#>  [49] "Chlorurus japanensis"        "Chlorurus gibbus"           
#>  [51] "Scarus koputea"              "Scarus longipinnis"         
#>  [53] "Scarus hoefleri"             "Bolbometopon muricatum"     
#>  [55] "Cetoscarus bicolor"          "Hipposcarus longiceps"      
#>  [57] "Scarus altipinnis"           "Scarus xanthopleura"        
#>  [59] "Chlorurus bowersi"           "Scarus chameleon"           
#>  [61] "Scarus festivus"             "Scarus forsteni"            
#>  [63] "Scarus frenatus"             "Chlorurus frontalis"        
#>  [65] "Scarus ghobban"              "Scarus niger"               
#>  [67] "Scarus oviceps"              "Scarus psittacus"           
#>  [69] "Scarus quoyi"                "Scarus rubroviolaceus"      
#>  [71] "Chlorurus sordidus"          "Scarus fuscocaudalis"       
#>  [73] "Scarus zelindae"             "Sparisoma amplum"           
#>  [75] "Sparisoma axillare"          "Scarus trispinosus"         
#>  [77] "Scarus chinensis"            "Scarus gracilis"            
#>  [79] "Chlorurus microrhinos"       "Sparisoma griseorubrum"     
#>  [81] "Sparisoma frondosum"         "Sparisoma tuiupiranga"      
#>  [83] "Scarus maculipinna"          "Scarus tricolor"            
#>  [85] "Sparisoma rocha"             "Cetoscarus ocellatus"       
#>  [87] "Sparisoma choati"            "Chlorurus spilurus"         
#>  [89] "Chlorurus perspicillatus"    "Hipposcarus harid"          
#>  [91] "Chlorurus atrilunula"        "Scarus caudofasciatus"      
#>  [93] "Chlorurus cyanescens"        "Chlorurus enneacanthus"     
#>  [95] "Scarus falcipinnis"          "Scarus russelii"            
#>  [97] "Scarus scaber"               "Scarus viridifucatus"       
#>  [99] "Scarus perrico"              "Chlorurus oedema"           
## All species in the Genus 
  species_list(Genus = 'Labroides')
#> [1] "Labroides rubrolabiatus" "Labroides dimidiatus"   
#> [3] "Labroides bicolor"       "Labroides pectoralis"   
#> [5] "Labroides phthirophagus"
